metadata.name: Mortal Society: Gold Token 1/123
metadata.description:
The gold token is designed to reward early supporters and OG (original) holders of the Mortal Society Universe as appreciation toward early adoption and support of the Mortal Society Universe project. It is distributed to users who hold Mortal Society Universe's origin history.

As an OG holder or early supporter, owning gold tokens provides a range of benefits. Firstly, it serves as a symbol of their contribution to the growth of the Mortal Society Universe project. Secondly, gold tokens provide access to exclusivity. 

In summary, the gold token is a means of rewarding and appreciation early supporters and OG holders of the Mortal Society Universe project.
